rooms.title: Crackle Workshop
rooms.description: Benches, tools, and half-built contraptions hum with patient possibility.

items.name: Clockwork Beetle
items.description: Tiny gears whir as it folds into a pocket-sized multitool.

items.name: Soldering Wand
items.description: Its tip glows when it senses an unfinished invention.

rooms.title: Gearworks Atrium
rooms.description: Floor-to-ceiling cogs lazily rotate in polite applause for every tinkerer who passes by.

rooms.title: Cogspring Well
rooms.description: A vertical fountain of gears trickles oil like water, powering hidden machines below.

rooms.title: Submerged Laboratory
rooms.description: Aquarium walls reveal experiments performed in bubbles, with fish wearing monocles taking notes.

rooms.title: Volcanic Forge
rooms.description: Anvils glow a gentle cherry red while sparks sketch blue afterimages in the air.

rooms.title: Heat Cradle
rooms.description: A suspended iron hammock radiates cozy warmth, perfect for incubating daring ideas.

rooms.title: Smoke Garden
rooms.description: Charcoal hedges puff scented rings that drift toward a cavern mouth below.

rooms.title: Ember Grotto
rooms.description: Ashen stalactites glow from within, breathing out embers that never quite touch the floor.

rooms.title: Atelier Dormitory
rooms.description: Hammocks stitched from blueprints sway gently, each muttering half-finished inventions in its sleep.

rooms.title: Windborne Loft
rooms.description: Gauzy curtains billow inward, revealing a balcony stocked with spare wings and parachutes.

rooms.title: Wind Tuning Tunnel
rooms.description: Pipes shift diameter with each step, harmonizing breezes into melodies of encouragement.
